name: Solar System Maker
description:
Instructions: Click and drag to spawn and launch planets.

This is the first test of a full solar system game/ simulator I want to make

I released this to let people play it while I take feedback and figure out where to take the game. (that's why there's no art)

Thanks for Playing  : )

ps: the game does have a bug where the planet will launch and then slingshot the opposite direction. I am currently working on fixing it, any suggestions on how to better achieve the launch effect? Lmk in the comments! (I used a spring joint and disabled it when the planet got close to the connected point)
